de.tud.kom.p2psim.overlay.bt
Class BTTrackerApplication

java.lang.Object
  de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.application.AbstractApplication
      de.tud.kom.p2psim.overlay.bt.BTTrackerApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
Application, Component, OperationCallback, SupportOperations
public class BTTrackerApplication
extends AbstractApplication

This class represents the tracker application. To instance it, you have to supply a BTTrackerNode to the constructor. To make it work, you have to use the methods of BTTrackerNode.

Author:
Jan Stolzenburg

Method Detail

connect

public void connect()

createOperation

public Operation createOperation(java.lang.String opName,
                                 java.lang.String[] params,
                                 OperationCallback caller)
Description copied from interface: SupportOperations
Create an appropriate Operation. The component checks whether it can create an operation with the given name and number of parameters. This method is used only to specify operations via configuration (action) files.

Parameters:
opName - - operation name
params - - operation parameters if required.
caller - - caller Object which will be informed when the operation finishes (successfully or with a failure)
Returns:
operation - created (can be scheduled or executed immediately)
